bug.author: gabrielnespoli
bug.summary: scoring_uri is said to be of bool type, but it's not
bug.description:
The scoring endpoint for the Webservice "azureml.core.webserivce.AksWebservice.scoring_uri" is listed as type bool, but it's not. It's necessary to correct the documentation <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h4>Document Details</denchmark-h>
⚠ Do not edit this section. It is required for docs.microsoft.com ➟ GitHub issue linking.
ID: a2c5068c-bf75-51ea-a8b3-a3356ba81b5c Version Independent ID: 9036f1f0-f669-bb28-74e7-3ea8dae6d7e9 Content: azureml.core.webservice.AksWebservice class - Azure Machine Learning Python Content Source: AzureML-Docset/stable/docs-ref-autogen/azureml-core/azureml.core.webservice.AksWebservice.yml Service: machine-learning Sub-service: core GitHub Login: @j-martens Microsoft Alias: jmartens

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/gabrielnespoli>@gabrielnespoli</denchmark-link>
Thanks for the feedback! I have assigned the issue to the content author to investigate further and update the document as appropriate.
Thanks for the report. We addressed this in the docs and change will appear live in next SDK release in 1-2 weeks.
